attributes.action: Explain why distance learning courses are subject to VAT as education should be exempt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to a recent ruling Customs and Excise have instructed my company to charge VAT on all our courses which is totally unjust.
If a student goes to a college the courses are exempt from VAT yet if someone on a low income studies at home they have to pay the extra 17.5%.
This makes a mockery of education for all!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Explain why distance learning courses are subject to VAT as education should be exempt."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14741.asp
